Reviews.Title: Cheap price, high quality phone!
Reviews.Author: astro_mike
Reviews.Content: Being a loyal Straight Talk customer I was skeptical purchasing this phone given it's under 100.00 price (usually you get what you pay for).  When I did finally decide to buy it at my local Walmart store I lucked out as it was on sale at a special promotional price of 39.88!! I couldn't believe it, the listed retail price is 89.99 on Straight Talk's website! It has the look, feel and performance of an Android 2.3 that you would think costs well over 100.00. It streams youtube, tune-in and iheart radio flawlessly (never buffers)! Battery life is much stronger then other android phones I have owned and it charges fast too. The one drawback to this phone is the camera is not the greatest sharpness but that is no huge deal with me. This phone is still somewhat new so accessories take quite a bit of looking around to find but they are out there (amazon). Bottom line.... this is the cheapest android phone I have ever purchased and it has performed the best and seems to have the best quality compared to more expensive Straight Talk android phones I owned in the past that ended up disappointing me. Buy one now!! It is a smart buy!Pros:-Affordable 2.3 android-Streams Pandora, iheart radio and other music apps flawlessly-Thin, clean design and very portable-Stronger battery life then most other Straight Talk androids-Charges fastCons:-Camera not as sharp as other android phones-Accessories while available take a lot of researching to find.  Can also be found under model name LG S3 E400

Reviews.Title: Touchscreen stopped working
Reviews.Author: Kim Slaughter
Reviews.Content: I've had this phone for 6 months, and have taken very good care of it. The touchscreen just stopped working and there is no way to fix it. All my contacts, pics, texts are lost. Don't waste your money!
